APP_ID.description: A random, public, identifier for this application

AUTH_SESSION_SECRET.description: The secret given to client-sessions to encrypt Cookies

MYMLH_CLIENT_ID.description: The public identifier for the app speaking to MyMLH

MYMLH_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The private secret used to confirm MyMLH client identity

MAILGUN_API_KEY.description: API key for accessing the Mailgun API

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: Access key ID for interacting with Amazon Web Services

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: Secret access key for interacting with Amazon Web Services

S3_BUCKET.description: Name of the AWS S3 bucket used to store files

PGUSER.description: Username used to access the database

PGPASSWORD.description: Password used to access the database

PGHOST.description: Host address used to connect to the database

PGPORT.description: Host address used to connect to the database

SLACK_API_TOKEN.description: API token for accessing the Slack API

STRIPE_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Private key for accessing the Stripe API

STRIPE_PUBLISH_KEY.description: Publishable key for accessing the Stripe API

APPLICATIONS_OPEN_STATUS.description: Indicates whether applications are open or closed

MAILCHIMP_API_KEY.description: API key for accessing the Mailchimp API

MAILCHIMP_INTERESTED_LIST_ID.description: Mailchimp List ID for the mailing list for people interested in the next Hack Cambridge event

PUSHER_KEY.description: API key for accessing the Pusher API
